reviews.review_msg: John is a great prof, he cares about the topics he teaches and is incredibly knowledgeable in these areas, which makes his lectures worthwhile. There is a lot of reading in this course (2 mid-length articles per week ) and a lot of info but if you study and pay attention, you will do well! he is also very unbiased and open to all opinion, love him!

This is my second time taking a course with him, and I must say this course was definitely a lot heavier than 305. He's definitely very passionate in what he teaches and I respect him a lot for that. I think his exams are more than fair as within every questions you have the option to pick which part you want to answer + he def cares about students
